page.title: 14Camelot
page.content: Camelot is the theme park at Park Hall, well placed near the M6 exit which leads from the Service Station. Built in the grounds of Park Hall. Opened in 1982. There are lots of activities at Camelot "Cinema 2000", "Big Apple Roller Coaster Circus","Dragons Back Jumping Bed", animated displays, adventure play ground, miniature railway. At the entrance there are two animated knights called Gavin and Gowain who say "welcome strangers to ye olde world of Camelot". In a cave there is Puff Dragon who speaks when you press a button. There are between 200,000 and 300,000 visitors in a year, who come from all over the world. The entrance fee of 2.50 includes all the activities.
